org.jetel.graph

Class EdgeDebugWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.EdgeDebugWriter

  • public class EdgeDebugWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class writes data records to an OutputStream, the data records can be read by EdgeDebugReader. EdgeDebugWriter and EdgeDebugReader classes are used to store requested data records flowing through an edge to temporary files.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the EdgeDebuger (if buffer used, it writes it to the tape). In writing mode it also writes end flag ( -1) to the tape to indicate that all data has been written (equivalent of EOF). View Data "Load more" functionality relies on this.
